behavior.name: documentation-structure
behavior.description: The documentation model for projects using the starterpack. Defines file layouts for single projects and monorepos, plus documentation principles. Documentation should not be extensive — just enough to know how to dig around.

principles.principle: README.md is the entry point and must reference docs/INDEX.md
INDEX.md always exists and references every other doc file
ARCHITECTURE.md is always present — gives the structural overview
Think in services and systems — each gets its own doc
Not extensive — just enough to navigate and understand the codebase
